DeleteAccountSection.title: Delete Account
DeleteAccountSection.description: Deleting your account is permanent and cannot be undone. This will delete any organizations you are the sole member of. Those organizations will have all their projects, agents, data sources, and other data deleted as well.

UpgradeBanner.title: Deploy, monitor and scale your agents in seconds

development-servers/dashboard/page.description: Letta allows you to create, deploy, and monitor stateful LLM agents
development-servers/dashboard/page.title: Welcome to the Letta developer platform!

createAgent.title: Create an agent
createAgent.description: Create an agent to deploy to your local server.

viewAgents.title: View local agents
viewAgents.description: View all of your agents on the local server.

internetChatbot.title: Internet Chatbot
internetChatbot.description: A general purpose chatbot designed to answer queries via the internet.

characterRoleplay.title: Character Roleplay
characterRoleplay.description: Create an agent to roleplay as a character from a fantasy world.

personalAssistant.title: Personal Assistant
personalAssistant.description: Chat between a user and a personal assistant designed to enhance the user's productivity.

scratch.title: Start from Scratch
scratch.description: Start with an empty agent with minimal default tools and a blank initial memory state.

customerSupport.title: Customer Support
customerSupport.description: An agent designed to answer customer support requests.

companion.title: Companion
companion.description: Chat between a user an an AI companion named Sam, designed to learn and adapt over time.

role.label: Click here to switch roles, the current role is {role}

alert.title: You are creating an agent on "{serverName}"
alert.descriptionLocal: This will create an agent locally on your machine. This does not deploy the agent to Letta Cloud.
alert.descriptionRemote: This will create an agent on the remote server. This will not deploy the agent to Letta Cloud.

starterKits.title: Starter Kits
starterKits.description: Choose from a starter pack and customize it in the ADE, or start from scratch

createChatBotWithMemory.title: Create a chatbot with memory
createChatBotWithMemory.description: Learn how to create a chatbot that can remember information from previous conversations.

buildMultiAgentSystems.title: Multi-agent systems
buildMultiAgentSystems.description: Learn how to create a multi-agent system where an orchestrator agent controls multiple (stateful) worker agents.

discord.title: Create a Discord bot
discord.description: Learn how to connect Letta agents to Discord to create Discord bots that have long-term memory and access to powerful tools.

voice.title: Activate voice mode
voice.description: Learn how to connect Letta agents to a voice service to allow users to chat with agents over speech-to-text and text-to-speech.

development-servers/shared/CreateLocalAg.info: This will create an agent locally on your machine. This does not deploy the agent to Letta Cloud.

development-servers/add.description: To add a remote server, you need to enable your remote letta server to accept public connections and add the --secure and --ade flags.

VersionAgentDialog.title: Version Agent

CloudUpsellDeploy.title: Deploy, Manage and Monitor your agents on Letta Cloud
CloudUpsellDeploy.description: Deploy your agent to Letta Cloud to manage and monitor your agents, get insights and more. Apply for early access below.

readyToDeploy.heading: Your template is good to go!

ADE/DeploymentAgentMangerPanel.emptyMessage: You haven't versioned this template yet. Click the button above to create a version of your agent template.

ADE/Welcome.title: Welcome to the Letta ADE!
ADE/Welcome.message: The Letta ADE is where you can create, customize and deploy your agents. You can even arrange the windows to suit your workflow, just drag the tabs.
ADE/Welcome.more: Right now you are in a template called <templateName></templateName>. You can customize this template in many ways, here are a few things you can do:
ADE/Welcome.editMemoryBlocks: Edit your template's <editCoreMemoriesButton></editCoreMemoriesButton> and customize who your agent is and who it talks to.
ADE/Welcome.editDataSources: Attach <editDataSourcesButton></editDataSourcesButton> to your template so your agent can look up information from external sources.
ADE/Welcome.simulate: Use the <agentSimulatorButton></agentSimulatorButton> to test talking to a deployed agent
ADE/Welcome.exploreArchivalMemories: Explore the <archivalMemoriesButton></archivalMemoriesButton> of your agents (see what your agents have learned).
ADE/Welcome.evenMore: When you're ready to create agents from your template, you can visit the <templateVersionButton></templateVersionButton> and create a new version of your template, then follow the instructions on that page to deploy your agents.

login/LoginComponent.title: Sign in to Letta Cloud
login/LoginComponent.terms: By clicking the button above, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

data-sources/files/page.title: Source Files
